topic.title: Tor to hide IP
topic.body: Hello Zeronet users I have a question regarding the setup of using tor and getting tor to work on here.  As I follow the guide that is found on "How To Make Tor Connection Work" when I reach the mcedit /etc/tor/torrc part I get an Error saying "Cannot Open /etc/tor/torrc For Reading". Do any of you know how to get past this Error? Any help will be greatly appreciated.

4893_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: It's safe in the sense that you have TRUE ownership of the value that is applied to your address when comparing to how much you have in say a bank account.
